<Link id="l00189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="189" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/spirvglobalregistry/#ab6f6cbbfa318b48e44bd1d86a483b05a"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/spirvglobalregistry/#ab6f6cbbfa318b48e44bd1d86a483b05a">updateIfExistAssignPtrTypeInstr</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;OldVal, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;NewVal,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00190" /><CodeLine lineNumber="190"><Highlight kind="normal">                                       </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> DeleteOld) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00191" /><CodeLine lineNumber="191"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/callinst">CallInst</a> &#42;CI = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/spirvglobalregistry/#af5f6ee60206f6ab5be7346e8125c3327">findAssignPtrTypeInstr</a>(OldVal)) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00198" /><CodeLine lineNumber="198"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// A registry of mutated values</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00199" /><CodeLine lineNumber="199"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// (see &#96;SPIRVPrepareFunctions::removeAggregateTypesFromSignature()&#96;):</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00200" /><CodeLine lineNumber="200"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// - Add a record.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00201" /><CodeLine lineNumber="201" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/spirvglobalregistry/#a797b7143b1b61fcf9445079c949e5d83"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/spirvglobalregistry/#a797b7143b1b61fcf9445079c949e5d83">addMutated</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;Val, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type">Type</a> &#42;Ty) &#123; MutatedAggRet&#91;Val&#93; = Ty; &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00202" /><CodeLine lineNumber="202"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// - Find a record.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00203" /><CodeLine lineNumber="203" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/spirvglobalregistry/#a928d32be153c2a7382697834cb0b7910"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type">Type</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/spirvglobalregistry/#a928d32be153c2a7382697834cb0b7910">findMutated</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;Val) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
